intro: Manglietia delavayi, commonly known as the Chinese hibiscus, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Malvaceae family and is characterized by its large, showy flowers that can reach up to 30 cm in diameter. The plant has heart-shaped leaves and produces capsule fruits that contain numerous seeds. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its striking floral display. Manglietia delavayi is also valued in traditional medicine for its potential therapeutic properties.
